PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-08022023-08-04PCH
ActBroadcasting Act
SubjectDirection Amending the Direction to the Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications Commission Respecting the Implementation of the Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement
PrecisDirection Amending the DIRECTION TO THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION RESPECTING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CANADA-UNITED STATES-MEXICO AGREEMENT in order to list unmodified and modified U.S. home shopping programming services based in the United States for distribution in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0181 Publication Date: 2023-08-16
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Direction Amending the Direction to the Canadian Radio-Television and Telecommunications Commission Respecting the Implementation of the Canada-United States-Mexico Agreement
precis: Direction Amending the DIRECTION TO THE CANADIAN RADIO-TELEVISION AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMMISSION RESPECTING THE IMPLEMENTATION OF THE CANADA-UNITED STATES-MEXICO AGREEMENT in order to list unmodified and modified U.S. home shopping programming services based in the United States for distribution in Canada.
